price: Rárá. Wọ́n máa tako ìjọ́sìn wọn, wọ́n si máa di ọ̀tá wọn.
arabic: كَلَّاۚ سَيَكۡفُرُونَ بِعِبَادَتِهِمۡ وَيَكُونُونَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ ضِدًّا

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: kallā sayakfurūna biʿibādatihim wayakūnūna ʿalayhim ḍiddan
